        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

   //Take the task associated with the appointment and cancel it
 var taskId = current.task;
 var catalog_id = current.catalog_item;
 
 if(global.JSUtil.nil(taskId) && global.JSUtil.nil(catalog_id))
  return;
 
 //Identify the table the catalog item is associated with
 var gr = new GlideRecord("sc_cat_item_producer");
  gr.get(catalog_id);
  if(gr.isValidRecord()){
    var taskTable = gr.getValue("table_name");
    gs.info("FSM: cancel appointment Task table :" + taskTable);
    var gr2 = new GlideRecord(taskTable);
    gr2.addQuery("sys_id",taskId.toString());
    gr2.addQuery("state","!=",7);
    gr2.query();
    if(gr2.next()){
      gs.info("FSM: cancel appointment Task id :" + taskId);
      gr2.work_notes= "Appointment " + previous.start.getDisplayValue() + " - " + previous.end.getDisplayValue() + " was cancelled by " + gs.getUserDisplayName();  //Do not use setValue
      gr2.setValue("state",7); //7 - Cancel
      gr2.update();
    }
  }

})(current, previous);]]></script>
